frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including components, utilities, types, and configuration files for the Glotaxa VAT calculator application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, with base styles for borders and background/foreground colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Glotaxa application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing three-tab interface (Country Selection, Transaction, Invoice) with state flow from country selection through VAT calculation to invoice generation.

frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking, and VAT calculation disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header component displaying Glotaxa brand with calculator icon and gradient background.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Empty file placeholder for hero section component.
frontend/src/components/InvoiceCalculato: Empty file placeholder for invoice calculator component.
frontend/src/components/InvoiceView.tsx: Empty file placeholder for invoice view component.
frontend/src/components/RegionSelector.t: Empty file placeholder for region selector component.
Empty file placeholder for tabbed interface component.
frontend/src/config/vatConfig.ts: Empty file placeholder for VAT configuration.
frontend/src/constants/productCategories: Empty file placeholder for product categories constants.
frontend/src/constants/vatCategories.ts: Empty file placeholder for VAT categories constants.
frontend/src/data/vatRules.ts: VAT rules configuration defining CountryCode type and VAT_RULES object with standard, reduced, and optional super-reduced rates for 11 EU countries plus UK.
frontend/src/engine/vatEngine.ts: VAT calculation engine implementing calculateVAT function with logic for reverse charge, exempt, zero-rated, reduced, and standard VAT rates based on country, category, and B2B status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing authenticated/anonymous actor creation using Internet Identity, with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components (primary, secondary, sidebar, charts, etc.) and dropdown z-index fixes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Invoice.tsx: Invoice generation page component that manages invoice details (seller, buyer, line items, payment terms), calculates VAT totals, and provides PDF/XML export functionality with EN 16931 compliance.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page component showcasing Glotaxa features (multi-country VAT calculation, compliant invoices, instant calculations) with hero section and feature grid.
frontend/src/pages/RegionSelect.tsx: Country selection page displaying EU member states and UK as selectable regions for VAT calculation, organized in a card-based grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/Transaction.tsx: VAT calculation page where users input net amount and select category to calculate VAT, with real-time results display and option to generate invoice from transaction data.
frontend/src/types/invoice.ts: TypeScript type definitions for EN 16931 compliant invoice data structures including header, seller/buyer details, line items, payment terms, and complete invoice interface.
frontend/src/utils/invoicePDF.ts: Utility function to generate and download PDF invoices from Invoice16931 data, creating formatted HTML with invoice details, line items table, VAT breakdown, and payment terms.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceXML.ts: Generates EN16931-compliant UBL XML invoices from Invoice16931 objects, including seller/buyer details, line items, tax subtotals, payment terms, and proper XML escaping.
frontend/src/utils/vatEngine.ts: Empty file intended for VAT calculation engine logic.
frontend/src/utils/vatLogicExplainer.ts: Empty file intended for VAT logic explanation functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended theme with sidebar/chart colors, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document for Glotaxa multi-country VAT calculator and invoice generator, documenting architectural decisions, known issues (VAT dropdown z-index problem), and completed features across 13 versions.
